page.title: 08ETONBURY SCHOOL DINNERS
page.content: Generally school dinners of Etonbury are very good.There is usually a choice of 3 or 4 main courses and 2 or 3 sweets.The school cook tries to choose a selection of food which she knows people like.For instance:chicken pie,beefburgers,bread rolls,cheese flan.spagetti,pizza,roast beef & yorkshire pudding,sausages or salad rolls.With your main course you can also have choice of vegetables e.g. chips,beans,peas,salad and coleslaw. {Favourite Dinners } In a survey done at school it was found that the favourite main courses were chicken pie,cheese flan and beefburgers.The dinners were described as soggy,pathetic,nice,horrible,all right and o.k.
